name: Thorrents
tagline: Smash old fashioned HTTP downloaders! Thor agrees!
body:
Thorrents is an open source project, it was live for some days just to prove it does work.

You can find the code here at github: https://github.com/makevoid/thorrents/

You can host the application on your server, it's open source! Thorrents consists of a webpage + a json api!
Please mind the licensing restrinctions about proxying of the country you live in.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
